#all requests are described here. 'type' must be first field in each description, order of the other fields is not important
#weight influences the proportion of given request among all requests

type => get
url => http://www.rextester.com
header => some-header => value
header => some-other-header => value
response_should_contain => some online tools for anyone who finds them useful
weight => 1

#let's test for valid pdf
type => get
url => https://github.com/JohnLangford/vowpal_wabbit/wiki/v6.1_tutorial.pdf
response_is_pdf => true
weight => 1

#let's make a post
#packet's body is a list of bytes delimited with |. Example for this particular request is here: http://rextester.com/NXHI3844

type => post
url => http://rextester.com/rundotnet/Run
header => Content-Type => application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8
header => X-Requested-With => XMLHttpRequest
header => Pragma => no-cache
body_bytes => 76|97|110|103|117|97|103|101|67|104|111|105|99|101|87|114|97|112|112|101|114|61|49|38|69|100|105|116|111|114|67|104|111|105|99|101|87|114|97|112|112|101|114|61|49|38|80|114|111|103|114|97|109|61|37|50|70|37|50|70|84|105|116|108|101|43|111|102|43|116|104|105|115|43|99|111|100|101|37|48|68|37|48|65|37|50|70|37|50|70|82|101|120|116|101|115|116|101|114|46|80|114|111|103|114|97|109|46|77|97|105|110|43|105|115|43|116|104|101|43|101|110|116|114|121|43|112|111|105|110|116|43|102|111|114|43|121|111|117|114|43|99|111|100|101|46|43|68|111|110|39|116|43|99|104|97|110|103|101|43|105|116|46|37|48|68|37|48|65|37|48|68|37|48|65|117|115|105|110|103|43|83|121|115|116|101|109|37|51|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|117|115|105|110|103|43|83|121|115|116|101|109|46|67|111|108|108|101|99|116|105|111|110|115|46|71|101|110|101|114|105|99|37|51|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|117|115|105|110|103|43|83|121|115|116|101|109|46|76|105|110|113|37|51|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|117|115|105|110|103|43|83|121|115|116|101|109|46|84|101|120|116|46|82|101|103|117|108|97|114|69|120|112|114|101|115|115|105|111|110|115|37|51|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|37|48|68|37|48|65|110|97|109|101|115|112|97|99|101|43|82|101|120|116|101|115|116|101|114|37|48|68|37|48|65|37|55|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|112|117|98|108|105|99|43|99|108|97|115|115|43|80|114|111|103|114|97|109|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|37|55|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|112|117|98|108|105|99|43|115|116|97|116|105|99|43|118|111|105|100|43|77|97|105|110|40|115|116|114|105|110|103|37|53|66|37|53|68|43|97|114|103|115|41|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|37|55|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|37|50|70|37|50|70|89|111|117|114|43|99|111|100|101|43|103|111|101|115|43|104|101|114|101|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|67|111|110|115|111|108|101|46|87|114|105|116|101|76|105|110|101|40|37|50|50|72|101|108|108|111|37|50|67|43|119|111|114|108|100|33|37|50|50|41|37|51|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|37|55|68|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|37|55|68|37|48|68|37|48|65|37|55|68|38|73|110|112|117|116|61|38|83|104|111|119|87|97|114|110|105|110|103|115|61|102|97|108|115|101|38|84|105|116|108|101|61|38|83|97|118|101|100|79|117|116|112|117|116|61|38|87|104|111|108|101|69|114|114|111|114|61|38|87|104|111|108|101|87|97|114|110|105|110|103|61|38|83|116|97|116|115|84|111|83|97|118|101|61|38|67|111|100|101|71|117|105|100|61|38|73|115|73|110|69|100|105|116|77|111|100|101|61|70|97|108|115|101|38|73|115|76|105|118|101|61|70|97|108|115|101|
response_should_contain => Hello, world!
weight => 1

type => post
url => http://rextester.com/rundotnet/Run
header => Content-Type => application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8
header => X-Requested-With => XMLHttpRequest
header => Pragma => no-cache
body_bytes => 76|97|110|103|117|97|103|101|67|104|111|105|99|101|87|114|97|112|112|101|114|61|52|38|69|100|105|116|111|114|67|104|111|105|99|101|87|114|97|112|112|101|114|61|49|38|80|114|111|103|114|97|109|61|37|50|70|37|50|70|84|105|116|108|101|43|111|102|43|116|104|105|115|43|99|111|100|101|37|48|68|37|48|65|37|50|70|37|50|70|39|109|97|105|110|39|43|109|101|116|104|111|100|43|109|117|115|116|43|98|101|43|105|110|43|97|43|99|108|97|115|115|43|39|82|101|120|116|101|115|116|101|114|39|46|37|48|68|37|48|65|37|48|68|37|48|65|105|109|112|111|114|116|43|106|97|118|97|46|117|116|105|108|46|42|37|51|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|105|109|112|111|114|116|43|106|97|118|97|46|108|97|110|103|46|42|37|51|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|37|48|68|37|48|65|99|108|97|115|115|43|82|101|120|116|101|115|116|101|114|37|48|68|37|48|65|37|55|66|43|43|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|112|117|98|108|105|99|43|115|116|97|116|105|99|43|118|111|105|100|43|109|97|105|110|40|83|116|114|105|110|103|43|97|114|103|115|37|53|66|37|53|68|41|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|37|55|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|43|83|121|115|116|101|109|46|111|117|116|46|112|114|105|110|116|108|110|40|37|50|50|72|101|108|108|111|37|50|67|43|87|111|114|108|100|33|37|50|50|41|37|51|66|37|48|68|37|48|65|43|43|43|43|37|55|68|37|48|68|37|48|65|37|55|68|38|73|110|112|117|116|61|38|84|105|116|108|101|61|38|83|97|118|101|100|79|117|116|112|117|116|61|38|87|104|111|108|101|69|114|114|111|114|61|38|87|104|111|108|101|87|97|114|110|105|110|103|61|38|83|116|97|116|115|84|111|83|97|118|101|61|38|67|111|100|101|71|117|105|100|61|38|73|115|73|110|69|100|105|116|77|111|100|101|61|70|97|108|115|101|38|73|115|76|105|118|101|61|70|97|108|115|101|
response_should_contain => Hello, World!
weight => 1

#these headers will be included in all requests
common_header => common-to-all-requests-header => some-value
common_header => common-to-all-requests-header2 => some-value2
